Two sample proportion test

two_proportion_test.Rd

Two sample proportion test

Usage

two_proportion_test(x, ...)

# S3 method for class 'formula'
two_proportion_test(
  formula,
  data,
  success,
  method = c("default", "chisq", "exact"),
  alternative = c("two.sided", "less", "greater"),
  ...
)

# Default S3 method
two_proportion_test(
  x,
  n,
  method = c("default", "chisq", "exact"),
  alternative = c("two.sided", "less", "greater"),
  conf.level = 0.95,
  conf.adjust = 1,
  correct = TRUE,
  ...
)

pairwise_proportion_test(formula, data, ...)
